snippet: Gov. Terry McAuliffe was hospitalized Monday in Richmond with complications from being tossed by a horse and breaking seven ribs during a holiday trip to Africa with his family, a spokesman said.
abstract: Virginia Gov Terry McAuliffe is hospitalized in Richmond after being thrown from a horse and breaking seven ribs during holiday vacation in Africa.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Terry McAuliffe was hospitalized Monday in Richmond with complications from being tossed by a horse and breaking seven ribs during a holiday trip to Africa with his family, a spokesman said.

headline.main: Virginia: Governor Recovering After Fall From Horse
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Governor Recovering After Fall From Horse
